title: Marilyn Monroe: beyond the legend
brief_description: This documentary narrated by Richard Widmark, is a tribute to the legendary actress. Numerous film clips range from her earliest appearances in “Dangerous Years” and “All About Eve”, to her triumphant performance in “Bus Stop” and “The Misfits”. The film also features a wealth of rare archival and newsreel footage, as well as in depth interviews with colleagues and friends.
